text: Your alarm goes off you promptly wake up
Varoom can wait. Imma sleep
*3 hours pass*
You wake up again and realize that you have also missed English 106 and CS 191
You walk outside into the hallway. The hallway is empty. You plan to knock on a friend's door.
You knock on Ryan's door. He opens up the door and talks,
"Bro do you want to go to Cru this week? I think it would be a good way to spend the evening."
You and Ryan leave the residence hall and start walking on your way to the Cru meeting. You and Ryan are
confused as to the location of this week's meeting. On the way, a car pulls up in front of you. The driver
says that he thought you two looked lost and asks you if you need a ride.
You and Ryan hop into the back of the car. The driver locks the doors and suddenly starts speeding off
You start contemplating jumping out of the car.
You jump out of the car and suffer a fatal concussion

prompt: Don't jump out of the car.
text: You decide not to jump out of the car. The driver take you out into the forest and pulls you out of the car.
Ryan suggests that you make a run for it.
You and Ryan attempt to run away. The driver pulls out a handgun and shoots you in the calf. Ryan makes no
attempt to help you and successfully runs away You are now incapacitated and the driver walks towards you.
You and Ryan walk to Cru and get in touch with your faith. You walk back to your room afterwards and fall asleep

prompt: Don't go to Cru with Ryan
text: You tell Ryan that you don't feel like Cru tonight. Suddenly the two of you realize that you need to get your
resume checked by the CCO before 11:05 today. You quickly rush east on 1st street but have no idea where to go.
You both run into a narrow alley when two men dressed in black approach you.
Ross opens the door and says,
"Hey what's up bro. The guys and I are gonna party a bit before English,
you tryna get schmacked tonight?"
You tell Ross that you're down to get schmacked.  Ross takes you to his friends apartment. You have a few
drinks. Soon after, Ross' friend Shoujo suggest that you guys climb up to the roof of a retirement home.
You tell Ross that you can't get "schmacked" because you're late to church. You go back out to the hall.
